text: Cerium(III) oxide, also called cerium sesquioxide, is a chemical compound made of cerium and oxygen. It has the chemical formula . == Uses == Cerium(III) oxide can react with oxygen in the air to make cerium(IV) oxide. This is used to reuse the cerium(IV) oxide catalyst in catalytic converters. == Sources == Category:Oxides Category:Lanthanide compounds
title: Cerium(III) oxide
